text: is a former baseball player from Japan. Asai played in the Nippon baseball league. He initially played in the Pioneer League before moving on to the Hiroshima Toyo Carp in the Central League.https://www.baseball- reference.com/register/player.cgi?id=asai--001its At times he played as a pinch hitter.http://www.japantimes.co.jp/sports/2004/06/12/baseball/mlb/asais- grand-slam-sees-carp-top-giants/#.V5b_gdQrIrh ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Baseball people from Toyama Prefecture Category:Japanese baseball players Category:Nippon Professional Baseball infielders Category:Hiroshima Toyo Carp players Category:Japanese baseball coaches Category:Nippon Professional Baseball coaches
title: Itsuki Asai
